00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct List *list;
00028     SECTNUM nSect;
00029  
00030     adfEnvInitDefault();
00031 
00032     /* mount existing device */
00033     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00034     if (!hd) {
00035         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00036         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00037     }
00038 
00039     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00040     if (!vol) {
00041         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00042         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00043         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00044     }
00045     
00046     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00047 
00048     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00049     while(list) {
00050         printEntry(list->content);
00051         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00052         list = list->next;
00053     }
00054     freeList(list);
00055 
00056     putchar('\n');
00057 
00058 
00059     /* cd dir_2 */
00060     nSect = adfChangeDir(vol, "same_hash");
00061 
00062     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00063     while(list) {
00064         printEntry(list->content);
00065         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00066         list = list->next;
00067     }
00068     freeList(list);
00069 
00070     putchar('\n');
00071 
00072     /* not empty */
00073     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_2");
00074 
00075     /* first in same hash linked list */
00076     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_3a");
00077     /* second */
00078     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_3");
00079     /* last */
00080     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_1a");
00081 
00082     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00083     while(list) {
00084         printEntry(list->content);
00085         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00086         list = list->next;
00087     }
00088     freeList(list);
00089 
00090     putchar('\n');
00091 
00092     adfParentDir(vol);
00093 
00094     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "mod.And.DistantCall");
00095 
00096     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00097     while(list) {
00098         printEntry(list->content);
00099         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00100         list = list->next;
00101     }
00102     freeList(list);
00103 
00104     putchar('\n');
00105 
00106     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00107 
00108     adfUnMount(vol);
00109     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00110 
00111 
00112     adfEnvCleanUp();
00113 
00114     return 0;
00115 }
